name: The Zen Bull
overview:
The Zen Bull is a full service web company providing hosting, online marketing consultancy and arguably the best CMS software on the web to aspiring website owners looking for quality.

We pride ourselves on our unique approach to websites and marketing, bringing a breath of fresh air to your business, by allowing you to present your passion and authenticity right from the pages of your site to the kind of marketing we teach.

We believe that authenticity and passion shine through more than any advertising hype could ever hope to and we encourage you to allow us to prove it to you.

If you have a business or organisation you are passionate about, and connect with our authentic approach please contact us for more information.

The Ultimate Partnership:

Annie Infinite - Your Marketing Mentor - see more under her Profile. Along with her business partner who is a website designer extraordinaire in their business, The Zen Bull Annie Infinite also holds regular workshops and bootcamps teaching any business or website owner the power of using authentic Social Media Marketing strategies and quality SEO techniques. Her mission is to prove that good website marketing is not a mystery; it is a system and has steps that can be taught to anyone.
